titles.title: El Camino Real Para Los Texas Study Act of 1993
El Camino Real Para Los Texas Study Act of 1993

A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the El Camino Real Para Los Texas for potential addition to the National Trails System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6121-6122)

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. El Camino Real Para Los Texas Study Act of 1993 - Amends the National Trails System Act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the El Camino Real Para Los Texas for designation as a national scenic trail. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to work in cooperation with the Mexican government (including, but not limited to providing technical assistance) to determine the feasibility of establishing an international historic trail along the El Camino Real Para Los Texas. Authorizes appropriations.
